txt.en:
'Burning fungus-infested structures may be a slow help, but it is not enough, I fear. To end the infestation, I believe we will have to cut the head from the serpent, so to speak.

'The leader of the Globsnaga Orcs can be found to the south at Dalgum-ru. I think his existence has been tolerated quite long enough.

'When the deed is done, return to me.'
'Zarza is no more? Wonderful news.\n\n'Truly, [placeholder], you have proven yourself to be a stalwart and courageous defender of Khazad-d√ªm and all of her legitimate inhabitants.'
'Have you forgotten where you are going? Dalgum-ru is where you will find the leader of those Globsnaga Orcs.'
Though fire seemed to destroy the fungal structures, Tyki thinks that an end should be put to the leader of the Globsnaga Orcs.
The Globsnaga leader can be found at Dalgum-ru, south of the Shadowed Refuge.\n\nTyki wants you to find the Orc-leader at Dalgum-ru and put an end to his offending existence.
Speak to Tyki at the Shadowed Refuge
Tyki is at the Shadowed Refuge, north of Dalgum-ru.\n\nYou should return to Tyki to tell him of the death of Zarza, the Orc-leader.
